description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the clinical risk factor(s). Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Clinical finding' heirarchy or any code from the 'Health issues simple reference set'.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

value.value: <404684003 |Clinical finding (finding) OR ^1127581000000103 |Health issues simple reference set (foundation metadata concept) Refset
